page.title: 16MODERN MACHINES
page.content: We have four different farms but the biggest one is called Crown Lodge farm. Dad runs the farm he does all the bookwork but he drives the tractors and the combine. He has two brothers and two labourers . There are 512 acres altogether;about two hundred acres we rent off people who own land but don't farm it. We grow wheat,barley,potatoes,peas and sugar beet.Most of the grain goes to Boston,the potatoes to Sutton Bridge or Holbeach Hurn. The sugar beet goes to Spalding. We have nine tractors,two fork lifts and three ten ton carts. The latest implement on our farm is a fertilizer spreader .Which will hold a maximum weight of one and two third tons ,it is about 40 feet wide (12 metres).
